description: in black ink on blue paper a man stands on the left with his arms outstretched toward a flower in the lower right corner; in the upper right corner a sun shines rays on the man; writing in pencil on lower left margin of recto and verso not legible due to blue paper
inscription: LRC in plate: W.G. 19. | BC margin of sheet, in pencil: E 19
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 19 | LL in pencil, below image: Der Beglückte
title: The Happy One
